section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on June 2, 2021.*
section.heading: Information reporting.
section.text: Within 3 days after the Mayor's receipt of the transcript of proceedings relating to the issuance of the bonds, the Mayor shall transmit a copy of the transcript to the Secretary to the Council.

codify:insert.text: *NOTE: This section was created by temporary legislation that will expire on June 2, 2021.*

annotations.annotation: For temporary (225 days) creation of this section, see § 14 of Reunion Square Tax Increment Financing Temporary Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Law 23-146, Oct. 20, 2020, 67 DCR 9941).
